decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (PL101, PL110, PL113, (received 30/01/2013 with original application).
Travel Plan (received 19/03/2013 with original application). 
PL150 Rev P2 (received 05/08/2013)
PL111 Rev P1, PL112 Rev P1, PL151 Rev P1, PL200 Rev P1 (received 26/11/2013)) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - The extensions shall be constructed in accordance with the submitted materials approved in application 00046/A/P8(3) (Facing bricks - Ibstock Stafford Smooth Blue, Ibstock Glazed Yellow Fenestration and Metalwork powder coating - RAL 7024 'Graphite Grey.')
Condition : 4 - The measures contained within the approved Travel Plan dated March 2013 shall be carried out in accordance with the timescales detailed in the approved Travel Plan.
description: Variation of conditon 2 (approved plans) of planning permission 00046/A/P8 dated 26/03/2013 to allow the replacement of approved elevation drawings with new elevation drawings showing the monodraught units removed
